participant_1.background:

on weekends i like to go hiking.
i have a harsh inner critic.

I enjoy spending time with my pets in the cold weather.
My days are spent working, exercising, and trying to balance my work and family life.
this past summer i hiked the appalachian trail.
i love to tell jokes.
Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing?
I am well, thanks for asking! I am just enjoying a nice cup of tea.
That sounds lovely! I am currently at work, but I am looking forward to my weekend.
What are you doing this weekend?
I am going hiking with my family. We are hiking the Appalachian Trail this year.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have never been hiking before, but I have always wanted to try it.
You should definitely try it! It is a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I might just do that! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I am glad I could help.
I have a lot of favorite movies, but one of my favorites is "The Shawshank Redemption."
That is a great movie! I love the story and the characters.
Me too! It is a very well-made movie.
I agree! I am glad we have similar taste in movies.
Me too! It is always nice to find someone who enjoys the same things you do.
